title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When I open the context menu, the Team entry is missing.
EB: The Team entry should be present in the context menu when I open it.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the project containing both a .java file and another resource.
2. Right-click on the .java file.
3. Observe the context menu and check if the Team entry is missing.
